abstract.t: This Internet-Draft describes version 2 of the RPCSEC_GSS protocol. Version 2 is the same as Version 1 [[Comment.1: (RFC Editor please add reference to the RFC2203 item in the References, since xml2rfc does not allow xrefs in abstracts)]] adds support for channel bindings [[Comment.2: (RFC Editor please add reference to the RFC5056 item in the References)]].
